title: Scars of the Earth
description: Amanda is a healer, she is accustomed to falling into nightmares; she has witnessed terrible things ever since she could remember, horror scenes that an innocent childâ€™s mind should never have to process.Life as a healer had three Never question the Ancients.Never stay in a Scar that has a demon.And never fall in love.Unfortunately for Amanda, she broke all three.
author: C.S. Moore
